title: Speed of plane from acceleration equation

content.prompt: A plane starts at rest on a straight runway. For the first 30 s, the plane’s acceleration α is given as a function of time t by the equation α = βτ2, where β = 1/90 m/s4 and t is in seconds. What is the plane’s speed at t = 30 s ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
